00018 #include <vector>
00019 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00020 #include "lammpsreader.h"

00022 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00023     using namespace boost;
00024 using namespace std;
00025 
00026 bool LAMMPSReader::ReadTopology(string file,  Topology &top)
00027 {
00028    _topology = true;
00029    top.Cleanup();
00030 
00031    _fl.open(file.c_str());
00032     if(!_fl.is_open())
00033         throw std::ios_base::failure("Error on open topologyl file: " + file);
00034 
00035    NextFrame(top);
00036 
00037     _fl.close();
00038 
00039     return true;
00040 }
00041 
00042 bool LAMMPSReader::Open(const string &file)
00043 {
00044     _fl.open(file.c_str());
00045     if(!_fl.is_open())
00046         throw std::ios_base::failure("Error on open topologyl file: " + file);
00047     return true;
00048 }
00049 
00050 void LAMMPSReader::Close()
00051 {
00052     _fl.close();
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool LAMMPSReader::FirstFrame(Topology &top)
00056 {
00057     _topology = false;
00058     NextFrame(top);
00059     return true;
00060 }
00061 
00062 bool LAMMPSReader::NextFrame(Topology &top)
00063 {
00064     string line;
00065     getline(_fl, line);
00066     while(!_fl.eof()) {
00067         if(line.substr(0, 5) != "ITEM:")
00068             throw std::ios_base::failure("unexpected line in lammps file:\n"+line);
00069         if(line.substr(6) == "TIMESTEP") {
00070                 ReadTimestep(top, line);
00071         }
00072         else if(line.substr(6) == "NUMBER OF ATOMS") {
00073                 ReadNumAtoms(top, line);
00074         }
00075         else if(line.substr(6) == "BOX BOUNDS") {
00076                 ReadBox(top, line);
00077         }
00078         else if(line.substr(6, 5) == "ATOMS") {
00079                 ReadAtoms(top, line);
00080                 break;
00081         }
00082 
00083         else {
00084             throw std::ios_base::failure("unknown item lammps file : " + line.substr(6));
00085         }
00086         getline(_fl, line);
00087     }
00088     return !_fl.eof();;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void LAMMPSReader::ReadTimestep(Topology &top, string itemline)
00092 {
00093     string s;
00094     getline(_fl, s);
00095     top.setStep(boost::lexical_cast<int>(s));
00096     cout << "Reading frame, timestep " << top.getStep() << endl;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void LAMMPSReader::ReadBox(Topology &top, string itemline)
00100 {
00101     string s;
00102 
00103     matrix m;
00104     m.ZeroMatrix();
00105         
00106     for(int i=0; i<3; ++i) {
00107         getline(_fl, s);
00108         Tokenizer tok(s, " ");
00109         vector<double> v;
00110         tok.ConvertToVector(v);
00111         if(v.size()!=2)
00112             throw std::ios_base::failure("invalid box format");
00113         m[i][i] = v[1] - v[0];
00114     }
00115     top.setBox(m );
00116 }
00117 
00118 void LAMMPSReader::ReadNumAtoms(Topology &top, string itemline)
00119 {
00120     string s;
00121     getline(_fl, s);
00122     _natoms = boost::lexical_cast<int>(s);
00123     if(!_topology && _natoms !=top.BeadCount())
00124         std::runtime_error("number of beads in topology and trajectory difffer");
00125 }
00126 
00127 void LAMMPSReader::ReadAtoms(Topology &top, string itemline) {
00128     top.CreateResidue("dum");
00129     bool pos=false;
00130     bool force=false;
00131 
00132     vector<string> fields;
00133 
00134     {
00135         Tokenizer tok(itemline.substr(12), " ");
00136         tok.ToVector(fields);
00137         for(Tokenizer::iterator i=tok.begin(); i!=tok.end(); ++i) {
00138             if(*i == "x" || *i == "y" || *i == "z")
00139                 pos =true;
00140             else if(*i == "fx" || *i == "fy" || *i == "fz")
00141                 force=true;
00142         }
00143     }
00144     for(int i=0; i<_natoms; ++i) {
00145         string s;
00146         getline(_fl, s);
00147         Bead *b;
00148         if(_topology)
00149             b = top.CreateBead(1, "", top.GetOrCreateBeadType("no"), 0, 0, 0);
00150         else
00151             b = top.getBead(i);
00152 
00153         b->HasPos(pos);
00154         b->HasF(force);
00155 
00156         Tokenizer tok(s, " ");
00157         Tokenizer::iterator itok= tok.begin();
00158         for(size_t j=0; itok!=tok.end(); ++itok, ++j) {
00159             if(j == fields.size())
00160                 throw std::runtime_error("error, wrong number of columns in atoms section");
00161             else if(fields[j] == "x")
00162                 b->Pos().x() = boost::lexical_cast<double>(*itok);
00163             else if(fields[j] == "y")
00164                 b->Pos().y() = boost::lexical_cast<double>(*itok);
00165             else if(fields[j] == "z")
00166                 b->Pos().z() = boost::lexical_cast<double>(*itok);
00167             else if(fields[j] == "fx")
00168                 b->F().x() = boost::lexical_cast<double>(*itok);
00169             else if(fields[j] == "fy")
00170                 b->F().y() = boost::lexical_cast<double>(*itok);
00171             else if(fields[j] == "fz")
00172                 b->F().z() = boost::lexical_cast<double>(*itok);
00173             
00174         }
00175     }
00176 }
00177 
00178 }}
